name: Sarah Kaufman
description:
Sarah Kaufman... does it get any Jewier than that? Something like Rebecca Katz? Either way, it's up there.

In any case, this Sarah Kaufman was a straight A student who wanted to become a cardiovascular surgeon. Seriously, does it get any Jewier than that?

Well, Sarah had a change of heart and switched from medicine to... mixed martial arts. She won a number of titles, competed in UFC, and is considered one of the best pound-for-pound fighters.

Oh, and then there is this:

"I wasn't raised Jewish. My dad is Jewish, so I'm technically not part of that culture."

That's not Jewy at all...
